column4: I think I am having a memory leak somewhere and I don't quite know how I qould find out what is causing it or what to do.  Can anyone help?
My system just seems to get up to using a G of ram in a couple days.  I've only had ubuntu installed for about 2 weeks, and it's been going on since I instaleld as far as I can tell
what seems to be using all the ram?
you can stil make a module
